description: Highlighting a skeleton's daring yet humorous realization.
title: No Guts, No Glory
n_1: Skully stands at the road's edge, contemplating the crossing.
c1_1: Seems risky without my left side.
c2_1: But do you have the guts?
n_2: Boney points out the obvious lack, causing a moment of reflection.
n_3: Realization dawns on Skully with a mix of amusement and acceptance.
c2_3: Always knew you had it in you!
n_4: They share a laugh, embracing the situation with light-hearted bravery.
